form.name: form1

div.style: position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0px; background: #FFFFFF;

span.p: It is the time of year when we have elections for the high school student council officers for next school year. One requirement to run for an office is having served on student council at some time during high school.

p.span: If you would like to run for an office (president, vice-president, treasurer or secretary), please email Mrs Schmitmeyer by Friday, May 1 at 3:00 pm.

span.div: Please click here for the Academic Awards Ceremony program.
Also, below is the live stream URL for the Academic Awards Ceremony on Wednesday night.

br.span: Please click here for information on the elementary assignment pick-up and drop-off.

span.p: If you are interested in bridging the gap this summer, Summer Solutions is a great way to do it. Go to http://summersolutions.net and enter our school code: H45845FOR to purchase Summer Solutions books. These are a great way to help with the summer slide.

a.title: Location: Elementary Cafe Starting at: 7:00 PM
